#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t,a[100],odd=0,even=0;
cin>>t;
for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
{
   cin>>a[i];
   if(a[i]%2==0)
   {
       even++;
   }
    else
    odd++;

}

if(even>odd)
cout<<even-odd<<endl;

else
cout<<odd-even<<endl;

return 0;
}
